commit.message:
fix broken type parameter indexing logic in wfcheck

Fixes #36075

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@

+// except according to those terms.
+
+trait DeclarationParser {
+    type Declaration;
+}
+
+struct DeclarationListParser<'i, I, P>
+    where P: DeclarationParser<Declaration = I>
+{
+    input: &'i (),
+    parser: P
+}
+
+fn main() {}
